name: Ichirin Goes to Burger King
description:
IT'S ICHIRIN AND SHE GOES TO BURGER KING

This is a free Touhou fan visual novel in which Ichirin Kumoi and Unzan go to a burger king. Hilarity ensues

A very short and shitposty VN created in Renpy and done by fun because yes. It's super simple by nature, this features:

  • Four (technically five) routes featuring different characters from the Touhou series.
  • "Story" that lasts like less than an hour.
  • Cool OST made by Uchulups.
  • Comedy.

Note that this is made for fun so don't take it seriously lol. All the characters (and some ilustrations too) belong  to Team Shanghai Alice. Well never ask money for this game but if u feel like supporting in some way check out @Ghosty_Mega or @Uchulups at twitter lol Uchu makes banger music dang
